title: Virtual Reality-Based Immersive Social Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of history and social phenomena, proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: A process of exploring social phenomena and conducting collaborative projects in a virtual learning space using VR devices. Providing continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct historical events in a VR environment and analyze key social contexts.
Learners can establish project plans to solve social issues collaboratively with peers using virtual collaboration tools.

Learners analyze three societal phenomena (e.g., digital divide, climate change response) presented in a VR simulation, write a 500-word critical thinking report, and achieve an "excellent" rating in two or more of the three rubric criteria (logical coherence, evidence, creativity).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
